General.Name: 1CM Inc
General.Description: 1CM Inc. operates as a multidimensional cannabis company. It focuses on retail customers and technology to democratize cannabis markets. The company was formerly known as Leviathan Natural Products Inc. and changed its name to 1CM Inc. in September 2022. 1CM Inc. is based in Markham, Canada.
General.Address: 625 Cochrane Dr, Markham, ON, Canada, L3R 9R9
